EmailTemplate.name: Northam_Event_Defining_Data_Q115.Live Stream Invite - Day of - Last Chance
EmailTemplate.subject: It's Not Too Late to Register for A New Approach to Big Data - Live Streaming Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DEFINING DATA IN THE CLOUD ERA A Pivotal Strategy Update HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
There's still time to register for Pivotal's exclusive Executive Strategy and Product Update <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data?utm_source=Pivotal-Email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=New-Approach-to-Big-Data-in-the-Cloud> for press, analysts, customers and partners. This live online event will take place from 11:00AM to 12:30PM (PST).
Scott Yara, President and Head of Products and Sunny Madra, VP, Data Product Group, will unveil Pivotal's groundbreaking new approach and offering that will remove traditional barriers to data-driven innovation. In addition, hear from industry luminaries and customers how these new approaches will accelerate their data and cloud journeys.
Please register today <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data?utm_source=Pivotal-Email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=New-Approach-to-Big-Data-in-the-Cloud> and learn how Pivotal is powering enterprise transformation.
Regards, The Pivotal Team
